participant_1.name: Marcus
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic, loves to engage in sports and music.
participant_1.background: The name of my team is the Baltimore Ravens. I am an athlete. I had 128 tackles last year. I play football. My position is linebacker.

participant_2.name: Ava
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, enjoys music and exploring new experiences.
participant_2.background: I eat meat. I recently started working online. My favorite band is The Story So Far. My friends donâ€™t call me by my real name. I enjoy going to festivals.

content.text: I'm an athlete who recently started working online. What do you do for a living?
I'm a musician and I recently started playing shows at festivals.
That's cool! I used to play the drums, but I don't play much anymore.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different types of music, but my favorite band is The Story So Far.
I've heard of them! I've never seen them live, but I've heard good things.
They're really good! They put on a great show.
I'm glad to hear that. I'll have to check them out sometime.
You should! What are your favorite festivals?
I like going to music festivals, but I also like going to art festivals and food festivals.
I like going to music festivals too. I went to Lollapalooza last year and it was a blast.
I've always wanted to go to Lollapalooza! It looks like so much fun.
It was really fun! I got to see a lot of great bands and I had a great time with my friends.
You should go next year! It's a lot of fun.
